newsitem.title: THAILAND: Thai bourse halts trade in Land and House.
newsitem.headline: Thai bourse halts trade in Land and House.

text.p: The Stock Exchange of Thailand on Tuesday halted trade in the securities of Thai property firm Land and House Plc.

The exchange halted trade in the firm's shares and warrants pending disclosure of material information from the company. Reports in Thai newspapers suggested the firm was set to reduce its 1996 dividend payment.
